title: nbdev-hello-world
text: This is a simple example of nbdev functionality and workflow.

title: nbdev-hello-world
text:
How to use
Nothing to see here!

title: Hello world
text:
The autoreload extension is already loaded. To reload it, use:
  %reload_ext autoreload



source

say_hello

 say_hello (to)

Say hello to somebody

test_eq(say_hello("Hamel"), "Hello Hamel!")


source


HelloSayer

 HelloSayer (to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

source


HelloSayer.say

 HelloSayer.say ()

Do the saying

o = HelloSayer("Alexis")
o.say()

'Hello Alexis!'



source


foo

 foo ()
